translation.you_have_received_an_email: You have received the following email:
translation.answer_the_email_and_cover_topics: Reply to the email. Write something about all following topics:
translation.writing_instructions: Before writing, think about a suitable order of topics, a suitable subject, a suitable salutation, introduction and a suitable conclusion.
translation.welcome_banner_copy:
Hi, it's [Anatoli](https://www.x.com/makaroni4), maker of the **Email Writing Trainer**! ðŸ‘‹
 I built this to practice before taking an official [TELC B1 German Test](https://www.telc.net/sprachpruefungen/deutsch/zertifikat-deutsch-telc-deutsch-b1), which has a written assignment about responding to an E-mail. This trainer mimics the exact structure of the TELC E-mail test.
The E-mail is gerenated via Chat GPT, so you'll have to set your API key in the settings ([a note on where to get API key](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936850-where-do-i-find-my-api-key)). 

 EWT "supports" (it's funny to write supports, because it's all AI-generated) the following languages:
translation.set_api_key: Please, set Open AI API key
translation.restart_alert_question: Are you sure you want to restart the exam?
